    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase — Function.
    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase(args...; attributes...)

    Command works on plot args 1:N and accepts keyword arguments to style the plot. Creates a new scene!

    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase(attributes::Attributes, args...; attributes...)

    Like ComplexPhasePortrait.phase(args...; attributes...) but accepts a theme as first argument. Creates a new scene!

    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase! — Function.
    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase!(args...; attributes...)

    Command works on plot args 1:N and accepts keyword arguments to style the plot. Adds new plot to current_scene()

    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase!(scene::SceneLike, args...; attributes...)

    Command works on plot args 1:N and accepts keyword arguments to style the plot. Adds new plot to scene!

    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase!(attributes::Attributes, args...; attributes...)

    Like ComplexPhasePortrait.phase!(args...; attributes...) but accepts a theme as first argument. Adds new plot to current_scene()!

    ComplexPhasePortrait.phase!(attributes::Attributes, args...; attributes...)

    Like ComplexPhasePortrait.phase!(scene, args...; attributes...) but accepts a theme as second argument. Adds new plot to scene!
